statements: DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' AND duration_seconds > 30;
DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE user_id = 12345 AND device_type = 'mobile';
DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE duration_seconds > 600 AND page_url LIKE '%about%';
DELETE FROM website_visits WHERE visit_id = 100 AND user_id = 500;
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 200 OR user_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM pages_visited WHERE page_url = '/about' AND time_spent_on_page > '01:00:00';
DELETE FROM website_visitors WHERE visitor_id IN (SELECT visitor_id FROM pages_visited WHERE time_spent_on_page > '01:00:00');
DELETE FROM website_visitors WHERE visitor_id = 1001 AND page_visited = 'Home';
DELETE FROM visitor_devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' AND device_os = 'iOS';
